titles.title: To include Livingston County, the city of Jonesboro in Union County, and the city of Freeport in Stephenson County, Illinois, in the Lincoln National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act
Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act
Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act
This bill adds Livingston County, the city of Jonesboro in Union County, and the city of Freeport in Stephenson County, all in Illinois, to the Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area.
